headline: A new Israeli-Palestinian restaurant promotes peace through food in Paris
subhead: Edgar Laloum and Radjaa Aboudagga have just opened Sababa in Paris, offering bicultural culinary specialties. The two partners hope that, through the joys of culinary arts, they can help foster understanding and peace between communities.

headline: Oil group Perenco abandons facilities and pollution in heart of Guatemalan nature park
subhead: The French-British company left the Central American country over the summer. Since 2001, it had been operating an oil field inside the Laguna del Tigre National Park. The group stands accused of failing to fulfill any of its environmental restoration commitments.
